body:
Comment 1: 
We are aware of the history of incompatibilities between shells.
For a while we did try to write portable shell scripts, but that
was distracting us from the real work of writing Go, so we gave
up and decided to make bash a prerequisite for building Go from
source code.  I believe bash has been ported to OpenBSD.

Bash is not required to use Go binary distributions; it is only 
required for developers wishing to build Go from source.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
